short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create short bookmarks that can be typed in the search bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better Bookmarks allows users to type in short links that will automatically redirect them to their bookmark url. No need for typing in complicated urls to get to a page, generate a bookmark using Better Bookmarks for fast access.

Example usage: go/chat could redirect you to chat.openai.com
Type go/chat where you would normally type the url of the website.

Features
- Type in go/yourbookmark in the search bar to automatically redirect to the page you have set.
- Unrecognized bookmarks will give suggestions of similar bookmarks.
- Bookmark manager that lets you edit your bookmarks.
- Export bookmarks to share bookmark templates with others

Better Bookmarks uses no external servers and runs completely client side.
